thread.title: Great stay with awesome breakfast
thread.title_full: Great stay with awesome breakfast - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Queens/Queensboro Bridge, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jana M
title: Great stay with awesome breakfast
text: The location is 10 mins by subway from midtown Manhattan, which is great, considering the budget friendly price per night. Not the quietest neighbourhood, but the trains did not disrupt our sleep. Clean bathrooms, comfy beds. We did not expect such generous breakfast - cheese omelets, sausages, brocolli, roast potatoes, bagels, english muffins, waffles, choice of fresh fruit etc...The only thing which surprises us Europeans is the piles of paper and plastic dishes used up every single day.
